website_summaries.verdict: This corded blower is lightweight, and draws its power from a 2-speed motor.
pros: Tool-free assembly to convert it from a blower to a leaf vacuum
cons: Does not work well in wet fall conditions

customer_reviews.title: Retire the Broom!
customer_reviews.text: This blower is here to stay. It weighs almost nothing but puts out a stream of air that even cleared the cracks between the boards of my deck. It blows so hard that going around corners can cause things to go where you didn't want them. That's evidently what the "Low" setting is for. On "High" it blows leaves, oak tassels and most sticks twenty feet across the deck. When the UPS driver delivered it he said he had several WORX products that all perform well. Add this to the list. Edit to add: Shipping was lightning fast. It was here less than forty-eight hours after I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: creeper

customer_reviews.title: Need a good blower for average household stuff? This is a no brainier.
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale for around 28 bucks. It's $35 now. I've had it 2 years and I love it! I use it all the time, I have a 2 car oversize garage 1 average sized driveway, AND 3 patios, plus the sidewalk. So I use it a lot. If I were to run it over with the car and break it, I would be right back on Amazon buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Will V

customer_reviews.title: This thing certainly does blow!
customer_reviews.text: My stupid neighbor's stupid tree drops stupid leaves all over my beautiful Scott's lawn. And this tree doesn't just have a few leaves. It has millions of them. That drop...every day. On to my impeccable lawn. I use to have to spend weeks picking them up one by one by hand. But not anymore! I just plug this baby in and blast all those little leaves into the corner of my fence. Then I put them in a lawn debris receptacle that comes by bi-weekly. It's more convenient than Digiorno. Does this blow the hardest? Absolutely not. Does it blow the slowest? No sir. It blows the perfect amount to get the job done. Well done, WORX!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Papagiorgio

customer_reviews.title: Lasting and a strong enough wind to blow leaves from the grass
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this price I wasn't sure if it would be good but let me tell you what happened yesterday. I bought a house that yard had not been raked for 2 years. I got tired of raking so I pulled this thing out and it pushed 2 years of leaves and acorns to a pile, from the grass. And it works for hours on end. This is one of the best purchases I believe I've made.
customer_reviews.author: Cha'kwaina

customer_reviews.title: The biggest gripe I hold is that it doesn't have a great loop for hooking extension cords
customer_reviews.text: Dude. Seriously. This little guy has plenty of power. The only downside is the corded factor. I knew that purchasing so I can't take any stars off for that. It blows hard and is very light. The noise coming out of this guy is expected. The biggest gripe I hold is that it doesn't have a great loop for hooking extension cords. If you're a new homebuyer (like I was) and not looking to make a huge purchase of a gas powered or battery unit, this one will happily do the work you ask it to. Just buy a 50-75 ft extension cord and you will be golden!
customer_reviews.author: Damon Leto

customer_reviews.title: You won't go wrong ordering this model - Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best leaf blower I've ever had - lightweight and powerful, and not bad looking :). I likely will order an extra so I can keep one handy for the backyard, and another closer to the front. You'll be pleasantly surprised how powerful this 7.5 amp motor is. It's comparable to a 12-amp machine that I use for 'big projects' like wet, heavy leaves and cedar tree flags that drop in abundance during October and November.
customer_reviews.author: doggoverness

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Well built.
customer_reviews.text: I searched for HOURS to find the right one for my needs, which are: small to midsize suburban yard, spring / fall debris, grass clippings, on driveway and walkways. Plus, TWO speeds. I cant, for the life of me, understand why this isnt a universal feature on all blower brands. I have been using this for 5 months, during spring and summer in Kentucky, and can confirm it is a well built, lightweight, intended for all people (not just professional yard guys), easy to operate, and gets the job done. Good for your typical yard and home needs. Worth the HOURS spent looking. And, exceptional price. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: thebeegeeman

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months ?
customer_reviews.text: It just stopped working while in the middle of blowing our yard? The switch seems fine and it was well cared for so we have no idea? Not sure if we will attempt to return it since we didn't keep the box after the first month of using it. It worked really well for 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great little blower for small jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Works great... I live in a condo and just wanted something small for blowing off my deck and clearing the leafs out of a small area of landscaping out front. This is the perfect size... it does the trick and the two speeds are great. I tried a different blower with only one speed and it was to much for the mulch in my landscaping but the low speed on this works great for just blowing the leafs off without scattering all the mulch.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Blower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of my shoulder problem, sweeping my deck and stairway used to take half an hour and cause my shoulder to get sore. Using this new blower makes short work out of it. I already had a 45 foot extension cord, so I can go all the way down the steps and around my sidewalk as well, in only 10 minutes. It's so light it's easy to hold - just takes a little practice to learn how to direct the air stream and the whole place looks great now with just a little effort.
customer_reviews.author: P. H. Pace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller yards.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, mid-sized blower. Long enough to provide good control, and good amount of power. Very easy to store. Good for smaller suburban yards.
customer_reviews.author: Glo S.

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful, doesn’t come with cord!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy blows piles of wet pine needles off of my doorway, porch, and down onto the walkway while I’m still standing inside my door! Love it! Only downside (And I believe they mention it, but it just didn’t register) is that it doesn’t come with a cord. The plug is attached and recessed so you must find an extension cord that will plug in on the end and not the side with a round head. I don’t even have to ask my children to use it - they do it willingly because it’s light and easy and works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Meridith C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this - it's lightweight enough for me to use without hurting my back or arms and gets the job done well and quickly for the most part. I used it to blow off patio rugs and a gravel driveway (leaves and heavy dust) - it did so easily, but occasionally I had to point the nozzle directly at a stuck leaf to get it to move along. I experimented a little with blowing a few leaves around in freshly cut grass - it seemed to move light stuff around easily, but I would imagine heavy piles of leaves might be a bit much for it (without at least distributing the leaves a little first).
customer_reviews.author: Christy Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the money
customer_reviews.text: A little powerhouse,Fantastic for the money.I am using this for computer clean outs.Which on the low setting does a great job,Yes no more canned air for me.This unit will pay for itself in a month vs canned air.While its a good unit.It is not for moving heavy or wet leafs,but small piles are fine.I chose this over the other units for price and power.
customer_reviews.author: the old man

customer_reviews.title: Love the slower speed option
customer_reviews.text: I have zero experience with blowers and bought this one for the leaves in my entryway where there is furniture and fencing. I love the slower speed option which is far superior to blowing the leaves around those obstacles. The higher speed just traps the leaves against the fence. Lightweight enough for me (a 62 yr old woman) to carry. Plenty of power on the sidewalk too. Really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Having Fun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blower to blow dirt and dust in my curling club. Previously we would sweep the curling sheets off before the curling season began. This blower turned a +4 hour chore into a 1 hour breeze. At $30 I feel like I got my money's worth the first time using it. On the highest setting this blower really moves the dirt off a concrete floor. This would work for anyone wanting to clean out a garage as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lassila

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Clears the Porch
customer_reviews.text: This is not a high-powered blower, but it's great for blowing leaves and small things off of a deck or porch. It's very lightweight and easy to use. It's great using it for exactly what I needed it for -- blowing leaves and small debris off a deck or the driveway. I wouldn't try to clear a lawn with thick, wet leaves in the fall -- but it might do the job slowly if you had some time to kill. I recommend it for homeowners who need a leaf blower for light duty.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and at a good price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this item is a good buy. It is lightweight, easy to use and does possess enough power. This item uses an extension cord ( not included ) which I don’t find to be an issue as I’d rather use electricity then mess with gas or oil. And all-around good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jon James Bochnik

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and strong
customer_reviews.text: Really like this blower, I have a 10x20 enclosed deck with 2 trees hanging over it, it drops leaves constantly, every morning i had to sweep it, but once I bought this blower it makes it so much easier, literally takes 3 or 4 min to blow it off, I wish I would have bought one sooner
customer_reviews.author: jeff tucker

customer_reviews.title: I am really pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had a cordless blower blower that wasn't very powerful and didn't last lonng enough to get the job done so I decided to invest in a regular blower to see the difference. I am really pleased with my purchase! It has two options for how hard you want it to blow so I can get everything I want picked up with making a mess in the rocks that cover my front yard. It is light weight and easy to handle also. All in all I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But I love this blower
customer_reviews.text: I always had a problem blowing leaves because the blowers were too heavy for me. But I love this blower. It's light enough for me to use for hours and it's got great power for a blower it's size. I blew my back yard with it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Just enough power
customer_reviews.text: Need a Leave blower to remove the leaves and pine needles from the top of our RV and Awnings. This sucker Blows them all away with its 2 power settings. It's lightweight and easy to carry up the ladder and complete this weekly Fall task. I would recommend it. Happy Trails and see you next review.
customer_reviews.author: 3tailsRV

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: It seems as well made as my last one that lasted about 10 years. It's only about half as powerful as some of the others but it works well enough and costs about 1/3 as much as some of them. My last one was 15 amps and the difference in blowing power isn't nearly double. If you are always in a big hurry get the more expensive one. Otherwise this does fine. Less noise too.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Scheiner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blower! This thing is tiny (I was honestly ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blower! This thing is tiny (I was honestly a little scared when the box came) but it packs a major punch. The size allows for it to be handled extremely easily, but it quickly gets the job done. Very simple to use and NO GAS REQUIRED!
customer_reviews.author: poopshakes

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price for sure.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't do any better. The only complaint is a small one that it doesn't have a cord at all and so you plug the extension directly into it but not even sure if it bothers me or I'm nitpicking...
customer_reviews.author: R. DeLozier

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power!
customer_reviews.text: Encouraged by previous reviews, purchased this corded leaf blower and could not be more pleased with the performance for the price. At a significantly higher price, this would still be highly recommended. The low setting moves masses of leaves easily and the high setting extends the range, blowing really hard.
customer_reviews.author: NC26

customer_reviews.title: Great Leaf Blower
customer_reviews.text: The Workx blower works nicely. Light weight, and yet powerful. I needed 2 speeds as the lower speed doesn't blow away things that I don't want blown away. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He says it helped him help his neighbors clean up their debris and helped him easily clear his driveway - thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Sent to my brother in Hilton Head South Carolina one day after they were allowed to return after the hurricane. He says it helped him help his neighbors clean up their debris and helped him easily clear his driveway - thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hitch

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Its powerful and same as gas-filled blower, except this is electric. Only downfall about electric is that you can't go far distances because you're limited to an extension cord, but for areas close to a power outlet or as long as an extension cord will get you, this is great. Plus, you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julissa Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Blower!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I'd hoped for. Works great! Two power settings. Not extremely noisy either. Light weight enough for my arthritic hands to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Excellemt blower for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This blower blows! I have a small patio but raking leaves/dirt is a pain in the back. This blower makes what could easily be a 20 minute affair into under 2 minutes. I think for the price I've paid for it, it has probably paid itself many times over.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh Shetty

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose blower for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great multi-purpose blower. I actually bought it to blow out the garage and dry the cars and motorcycles after washing. It works great for all those tasks and I've even used it on the driveway when my gas powered blower is being temperamental . It's light and easy to use and has enough power for most any task you might have.
customer_reviews.author: doc m

customer_reviews.title: Good quality blower.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty powerful inexpensive blower. Perfect for back patios and driveways and walkways. Simple. Just plug it in and switch it on. Two speeds for light leaves or heavier debris.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this corded blower on the premise that I could get more power and a lighter unit at a lower price than with a battery powered device. Probably correct. This thing moves stuff! I've used it for blowing out the shop, moving leaves and snow, and drying the interior of my truck. Wish I had bought it a long time ago. I'll use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Armandeaux

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to remove water after washing the car. Also use it to sweep the garage. Works great for both. Decent power, light weight, and not too loud. Not sure how well it would work on wet leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Cell Block

customer_reviews.title: Easy, lightweight and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this easy to use lightweight blower. I would purchase another and would buy more for gifts. It will blow anything so be careful what setting you have it on!
customer_reviews.author: rbglenn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my small area
customer_reviews.text: I use this several times a week to blow off my patio and breezeway. It's size is good for that, and works perfectly the 10 or more times I've used it. For the price, surely you can't beat this. At the high setting, it really has a lot of "blow"!
customer_reviews.author: P. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great Value..works great
customer_reviews.text: Did not read thoroughly that it did not come with a cord. But had a long one plugged in and ready to go when this arrived. It works great. Gets the leaves off of my back patio and blows them right away from the back of the hot tub. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: What I really like about this blower is that it's light
customer_reviews.text: What I really like about this blower is that it's light, easy to handle and well-balanced. It's small enough for a kid to use but powerful enough to blow dry twigs and leaves without effort. It also does a good job blowing light snow off the walkway and porch. It seems robust and well built. Had it on a 100' long cord without any loss of power. Hard to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Dad

customer_reviews.title: My favorite yard tool!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple months now & I still smile every time I use it, which is almost daily. 2 speeds to get the job done: leaves, dirt, pine needles, drying off the outdoor rugs, and whatever else I can find to blow away! The neighborhood kids enjoy using it or being chased by "the windy thing" too. Definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Henson

customer_reviews.title: Gits Er Done!
customer_reviews.text: The blower works great. It's lightweight, easy to use and moves the air. It's a bit of a hassle dragging a cord around, but the tradeoff is that unlike a gas powered unit it works first time, every time. No muss, no fuss just gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: I will use mine mostly for cleaning off my front and back porches but it has enough power to do more if I chose to use it for ot
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I needed and wanted. I will use mine mostly for cleaning off my front and back porches but it has enough power to do more if I chose to use it for other things Very very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what people giving the negative reviews were expecting but I'm not sure it could be any better or more powerful and still be under $30.00
customer_reviews.author: A. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Still working after 2 season.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 season and still work. Not super strong but good enough for small job around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Jon lam

customer_reviews.title: Great Multipurpose Blower
customer_reviews.text: Great blower. Arrived quickly and works efficiently. I like the low and high fan speeds. Perfect for patios, carports and driveways. Anyone complaining that this isn't strong enough should probably be looking at industrial gas-powered blowers. This thing can move sneakers and coolers across the patio. Even does a decent job on large piles of leaves that best left for a rake.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Gates

customer_reviews.title: Good light to medium clean up tool
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Does light to medium work quite well. Not for heavy duty clean up but for the price it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric LB

customer_reviews.title: Great size to keep in the closet for quick jobs!
customer_reviews.text: I use this blower for small jobs. Quick touch ups on the porch and walkway. Very convenient and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Says Squat

customer_reviews.title: Great blower!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used my Worx for the first time. Boy, I am impressed. The lower speed will work for most things but the high speed will take care of most outdoor tasks quickly. It is much more powerful than I expected and made fast work of cleaning off my wind blown patio. A great purchase. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good for small space
customer_reviews.text: The blower is just the right size for our small house. It is light and easy to use, but strong enough to get the job done for us.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Work really well on dry leaves, have to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Work really well on dry leaves, have to put it on second power setting for wet leaves. I use this to clean my sidewalk and backyward. It will blow away loose change, glass, pebbles, small twigs, plastic bottles empty soda cans etc. I purchased a heavy duty extension cord to use with this blower. Woods 2452 14/3 SJTOW Agricultural Extension Cord, Black, 50-Feet
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: This rig BLOWS!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than cordless if you don't mind dragging the cord around. Light-weight and well-balanced. I use if to blow dry the cars after washing. Never have to lay a towel on the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Jean

customer_reviews.title: Awyeah!
customer_reviews.text: This blows out really well! Easy to assemble and pretty powerful. Happy for purchase, i hope it last!
customer_reviews.author: Howling Dave

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well. It's nice having 2 speeds. Pretty light but long use can kind of tire the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: bonifacio bio

customer_reviews.title: This is lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is lightweight and easy to use. It is ok for leaves on the walk and in the garage. It has two blower speeds and the low is not very powerful at all. This is fine for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: This Is a good blower except I didn’t realize that the strength was ...
customer_reviews.text: This Is a good blower except I didn’t realize that the strength was kind of weak. I have a farm and i used my old blower every day. This is not that strong I will probably be purchasing a blower that has a little more strength in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used a couple of times to clear my flower gardens of leaves this fall where its to difficult to rake without damaging my plants. Worked excellent! I also used it on our gravel driveway to clear lots of fallen pine needles and iit did a terrific job. So glad I made this purchase to make my yard more beautiful and easier to manage
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Best leaf blower ever. My 4 year old can even run it. Super light weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my small yard and driveway. Easy to use and can cary it easily due to its light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Roy P.

customer_reviews.title: A great little leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: A great little leaf blower. I don't know if people who gave it bad reviews need something more "robust", but this blower will do the job for most lawn care. It's powerful and relatively light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ivana

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Love this blower. Lightweight and powerful! If you can deal with the extension cord this is the blower for you.I have physical difficulties with both arms/shoulders and I can handle this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good blower
customer_reviews.text: I researched blowers and this one had good ratings - I wanted something light so it is not the most powerful blower but definitely good enough for my needs (blowing grass cuttings off the porch, leaves off the grass, etc.). It has two speeds. Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: mbsf

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love this little blower, in fact I just finished blown the side porch! Works great, has 2 speeds, and is light weight. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: swandeck

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just wanted a blower to blow off deck and driveway and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: WYO

customer_reviews.title: WORX BLOWER
customer_reviews.text: It is so much quitter than the one we had. It is easy to use and is much lighter than the other one that broke. We really do like using this one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Small, lightweight, but with good power and control.
customer_reviews.text: Small, lightweight, but with good power and control. The two speeds seem to be just right for me. Hopefully it will last and/or prove to be repairable (when it needs it).
customer_reviews.author: Winenut

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for money and usage
customer_reviews.text: Can blow balcony clean in short time. Stows easily and perfect for my use
customer_reviews.author: Bobbe Howard

customer_reviews.title: Super value, light weight great price.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight works equalie as good as my m y old B and D blower that went in the trash after many years of service. So if it last me a few years it will be a darn deal! I like how the power cord attaches it stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Alabama

customer_reviews.title: A perfect little leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from worx have had their weed eater for over 8 years and still get free spools this little leaf blower works great strong and durable lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Don Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small porch! A little too much power but better too much than not enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Common form factor for lightweight blower. Seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Common form factor for lightweight blower. Seems to be made well and I had no complaints. Quantity of air is usable for light tasks such as drying a car after washing it. I would have kept it but is was more attractive to trade it in for the more powerful "turbine" model at comparable price (discounted sale).
customer_reviews.author: SurfCityMike

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive corded blower works as expected. mainly use it ...
customer_reviews.text: inexpensive corded blower works as expected. mainly use it to 'sweep' the garage but works for cleaning up after mowing as well. a little on the loud side but aren't they all. cant beat if for the price.
customer_reviews.author: yasky

customer_reviews.title: Use it to dry my car
customer_reviews.text: Works well for drying my car when I wash it. It does not however do well with blowing leaves that are caught up in the lawn. It does ok blowing leaves off my driveway but doesnt blow them far.
customer_reviews.author: JoVa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Neat powerful little blower you don't have to pull start or clean the carb.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa Retired

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the cost
customer_reviews.text: It does have some power and it is light weight. The plug itself however, does have a habit of coming unseated which can be frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Shaun O.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight with just enough power
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for quickly blowing grass off walk ways and patio
customer_reviews.author: Effie Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Mind Blower ... Blower
customer_reviews.text: I just great all around, love speed, works great and just a great buy. 5 star winner in my book, love it " Work WG506 Corded Blower. 7.5 Amp. Great speed all around. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for its size
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Light weight but powerful enough to do what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Boas

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: For the money can't beat it. Easy to use. Man......real strong Push of air. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! From 20 minutes of sweeping my patio to less than 5 minutes to blow leaves away. Wa la! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight blower
customer_reviews.text: A nice two-speed blower. Easy to assemble out of the box, with two clicks and ready to go. Does not have a strong kickback. Strong enough to clear away pine straw and leaves on a patio, but not in overwhelmingly large piles.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Amazon purchase ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is POWERFUL! Love it! So nice to not have the smell of gasoline in the garage after using the gas blower.
customer_reviews.author: LKBN 1

customer_reviews.title: Small, lightweight and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Small, lightweight and convenient. It isn't as powerful as the Toro but gets the job done. Great for blowing off walks and drives.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: So very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Loved how light this machine is and it is packed with power!
customer_reviews.author: H Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Small and puts out a good amount of air
customer_reviews.text: Small and puts out a good amount of air. I bought it to dry my car after a Carwash. But will be used on the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Super Mario

customer_reviews.title: This WORX WG506 Corded Blower works good for it's purpose of small areas
customer_reviews.text: This WORX WG506 Corded Blower works good for it's purpose of small areas, small yards, decks, and patios. If you need a small light weight blower that is easy to use and does not require you dealing with mixed fuel and pull start, this will work very well for you. It's not as powerful as a gas powered blower and I would not recommend it if you have a large yard. I would purchase this blower again for the areas immediately around the house, deck, and patio.
customer_reviews.author: Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He loves it. It's nice and compact. Not too heavy. He uses it in our newly built garage. He highly recommends. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: dolphins0916

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best money spent! Perfect for my porch! Electric blower works so great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Becka

customer_reviews.title: workd grest
customer_reviews.text: For the money you can't go wrong. I have had it for 6 months now. And it's still working great. No problems very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy f

customer_reviews.title: Better then battery powered in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it supposed to do! Better then battery powered in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: A deal
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive, and works very well. Not as much power as my old Black and Decker (died after 8 years), but half the price. 75-80% of the power, but good!
customer_reviews.author: Dale A. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price, but doesn't pack much of a punch. It served its purpose for the season, but I will most likely be purchasing a gas powered one in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great to remove leave and pine needles from off our ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great to remove leave and pine needles from off our concrete patio. The blower is no louder than my hair dryer. It's light weight and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ladydi

customer_reviews.title: Is adequate for sweeping and light leaf blowing needs.
customer_reviews.text: It blows hard, but a little wimpy for serious leaf blowing.
customer_reviews.author: Parknick

customer_reviews.title: Great for my RV
customer_reviews.text: Bought this blower to clean off the top of my RV slide out. works PERFECT for this. Lightweight and breaks down well to not take up much space. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Cicchetti

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for a small leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: I'm no expert on leaf blowers but I tried this out as soon as I got it and it's powerful! I purchased it to blow leaves and debris of the deck, sidewalk, driveway and yard. It's so powerful that it was kicking up more dirt than I expected. :-)
customer_reviews.author: BeeHappy

customer_reviews.title: ... and the lightness and power of this unit is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly parents who can no longer start our gas blower and the lightness and power of this unit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JROD

customer_reviews.title: A great blower especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: A great blower especially for the price. There probably more powerful blowers available. But my yard has corral gravel. I have to be careful to point this unit a distance away or it will blow away the gravel.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent L Penn

customer_reviews.title: Blows everywhere without directional tip
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but does not have a directional tip so it just blows everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Judy Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect budget blower for our home
customer_reviews.text: Perfect leaf blower for us. Able to remove wet leaves from the back patio and does an excellent job moving yard debris from the driveway and front walk after mowing and edging. Been using for months and it is still strong and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Alex H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: I love this leaf blower. Its the first I've ever had and just needed something to save me time from sweeping my small yard/driveway. It's very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

product_meta.title: WORX WG506 7.5 Amp 2-Speed Electric Leaf Blower,Orange and Black
product_meta.description: The WORX WG506 2-Speed Corded Blower is lightweight and easy to use. It has a simple tool-free assembly to get you started right out of the box. Use this blower for clearing debris from larger areas all around the home or business. No gasoline and no fumes. With a 7.5 amp motor and adjustable air speed from 130 to 160, it is practical for clearing patios, decks, driveways, sidewalks, steps, parking areas and small business areas. The tube design produces 160 cfm of air volume offering sufficient power to tackle a multitude of blowing and sweeping duties.
feature_bullets: 7.5 amp with efficient tube design producing 160 cfm air volume
Air speed range from 130-160 mph.Rated Voltage: 120V~60Hz
External extension cord is required for operation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars524 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
